articles.author: Robert Lea
articles.title: This 'forbidden' exoplanet is way too massive for its star - Space.com
articles.description: "This discovery really drives home the point of just how little we know about the universe. We wouldn’t expect a planet this heavy around such a low-mass star to exist."
